The girls are so darn cute it should be illegal. Every single ã‚¦ãƒå¨˜ feels unique â€” from their gorgeous designs to their quirky, lovable personalities. Youâ€™ll quickly find yourself picking favoritesâ€¦ and then picking new favorites again and again.

The voice acting? Absolutely god-tier. The å£°å„ª cast is stacked, and theyâ€™ve delivered phenomenal performances that breathe so much life into each character. Itâ€™s honestly one of the best parts of the experience.

And then came "Still In Love" (ã‚¹ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ«ãƒ»ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ»ãƒ©ãƒ–). A yandere ã‚¦ãƒå¨˜? Thatâ€™s where I bowed down and accepted this as the ultimate game. Peak. Perfection.

Gameplay-wise, itâ€™s approachable and easy to get into, but also offers a continuous learning curve. Eachè‚²æˆ run teaches you something new and pushes you to improve, making victories feel earned and satisfying.

Overall? If you like charm, personality, music that slaps, and racing your way into obsession â€” I highly recommend this game.
